changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `erp_ac_user_account_set` ( `id` BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键ID', `user_code` VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '用户code', `account_set_code` varchar(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '帐套code', `selected` tinyint NOT NULL default 0 COMMENT '是否当前选择的帐套', `user_role` varchar(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '用户在帐套的角色', `created_date` TIMESTAMP(0) NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间', `created_by` VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL COMMENT '创建人', `last_modified_date` TIMESTAMP(0) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '最后更新时间', `last_modified_by` VARCHAR(60) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '最后更新人', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = INNODB AUTO_INCREMENT = 1 CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4 COLLATE = utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT '财务-用户的帐套';
